DOC.detailed_description: Twenty child least two carious molar teeth without pulpal involvement participate randomized clinical trial . A total 40 teeth randomly divide two treatment group : group A , papain-based gel ; group B , conventional technique . Data collection include time require caries removal , need local anesthesia , degree discomfort , change number viable bacteria , clinical evaluation glass ionomer-cement restoration 6-month post-treatment .
